Finally got a kerbal to the Mun and Minmus (Woot!) but how do I use my jet pack? Also I was pressing random keyboard buttons and now when I move forward he goes in the direction I'm facing with the camera but if I try to go left with "A", then he side steps rather than turning and walking forward in THAT direction (left). How can I fix this?

Thanks in advance.
To use the jet pack press "r". And the Alt key toggles the way the kerbal moves (sidestep or turn).
Sounds like you already have the jetpack activated (with the r key) if he's side-stepping. Use Shift and Control on the left to thrust upwards or downwards (and a-s-w-d for left-back-forward-right).
